snippet: The government published a report calling for cigarettes to be sold in plain packaging as a way of dissuading young people from smoking.
abstract: British government takes steps to impose ban on branding for cigarette packs, indicating that it is likely to go ahead with sweeping new restrictions on the marketing of tobacco.
lead_paragraph: The government published a report calling for cigarettes to be sold in plain packaging as a way of dissuading young people from smoking.

headline.main: Britain Shows Support for Tougher Cigarette Laws
headline.print_headline: Britain Shows Its Support for Tougher Cigarette Laws
